overview: Lil' Fizz, Raz-B, J-Boog and Omarion, collectively known as R&B boy band B2K, star in this banging music video collection that features their biggest hits, including "Uh Huh," "Gots Ta Be," "Why I Love You," "Bump, Bump, Bump" and "Girlfriend." Hip-hop artist and media mogul Puff Daddy appears in the video for "Bump, Bump, Bump," which was the popular group's first No. 1 single on the Billboard charts.
title: B2K: The Ultimate Video Collection
